participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, loves to have fun and enjoy life.
participant_1.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i am a party animal. i'm deathly afraid of heights. i own a cat and a dog.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented and hardworking, enjoys spending time with loved ones.
participant_2.background: my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. my wife and kids are the best. i'm a plumber.
